body:
Comment 1: 
From the description: http://golang.org/pkg/go/parser/#ParseFile

"If src != nil, ParseFile parses the file source from src. src may be provided in a
variety of formats. At the moment the following types are supported: string, []byte, and
io.Reader. In this case, filename is only used for source position information and error
messages."

The parser (and scanner) already provides this functionality and has done so from the
very beginning.
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
